Content: it was so good until today! the app crashed and I lost all my answers. please fix the bugs
I dont know. It lags and it crashes. Is that even necessary?
Please add "SYNC" feature. If my phone crashes and it loses all its data, I can easily restore it via my email. Thanks!

I really like the idea of your application. I would rate it 5 stars if it would work with my WiFi. Whenever I turn the mobile data off and my WiFi on, the application tells me to have a look at my connection. It freezes sometimes...
